title: I Want To Do More With Her Than Smoke
itunes:title: I Want To Do More With Her Than Smoke
description:
Dear Steve and Shirley, I am a 41 year old single man and I have a great job, my own car and a very nice apartment. Ideally, I want to buy a house and I’m working on it. There’s a beautiful woman that lives in my complex… She’s got that Nia Long vibe and she’s a chocolate goddess. We’ve seen each other in passing and I speak and she speaks back. She doesn’t have men going in and out of her place and she rarely has company at all, at her place.............

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
Dear Steve and Shirley, I am a 41 year old single man and I have a great job, my own car and a very nice apartment. Ideally, I want to buy a house and I’m working on it. There’s a beautiful woman that lives in my complex… She’s got that Nia Long vibe and she’s a chocolate goddess. We’ve seen each other in passing and I speak and she speaks back. She doesn’t have men going in and out of her place and she rarely has company at all, at her place.............
